issue.title: Option to use dark theme for Windows
issue.body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
An option in settings to switch between light and dark theme. Will be great if it works on every OS like Electrum. However, created the issue specifically for 'Windows' because https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/issues/68#issuecomment-873549059

**Describe the solution you'd like**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13405205/124391068-63e17c80-dd0c-11eb-818c-d867e89df603.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13405205/124391893-68a82f80-dd10-11eb-9d1f-098979387114.png)



**Describe alternatives you've considered**
1. Workarounds for Linux: https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/issues/68#issuecomment-678196654
2. Not use GUI

**Additional context**
I tried few things: https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/issues/68#issuecomment-794431238. Worked partially for Linux but didn't work on Windows. 

Also tried running master branch on Windows but there is no change in GUI.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13405205/124391958-c50b4f00-dd10-11eb-87b5-e571602ca372.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13405205/124391966-d05e7a80-dd10-11eb-90fc-a2c6b2f52605.png)
